detaileddescription.para: Creates a default sample with no data in it. ...
Creates a sample with position data but no index or count data. For specifying samples after the first one

memberdef.argsstring: (const Abc::P3fArraySample &iPos, const Abc::Int32ArraySample &iNVertices, const CurveType &iType=kCubic, const CurvePeriodicity iWrap=kNonPeriodic, const OFloatGeomParam::Sample &iWidths=OFloatGeomParam::Sample(), const OV2fGeomParam::Sample &iUVs=OV2fGeomParam::Sample(), const ON3fGeomParam::Sample &iNormals=ON3fGeomParam::Sample(), const BasisType &iBasis=kBezierBasis, const Abc::FloatArraySample &iPosWeight=Abc::FloatArraySample(), const Abc::UcharArraySample &iOrders=Abc::UcharArraySample(), const Abc::FloatArraySample &iKnots=Abc::FloatArraySample())
memberdef.name: Sample

detaileddescription.para: Creates a sample with position data, index data, count data, and optional UV and Normals data. For specifying samples with an explicit topology. The first sample must be full like this. Subsequent samples may also be full like this, which would indicate a change of topology
an array of ints that corresponds to the number of vertices per curve
